ygData.subject: Re: NEAT4J to evolve a NN to control a Hexapod Robot
ygData.msgSnippet: Any class that passes between the server and the remote agent must implement the serializable interface (and any class contained within etc).  I suspect yuou

Any class that passes between the server and the remote agent must
implemen=
t the serializable interface (and any class contained within
etc).  I suspe=
ct yuou create a class that does not do this within your
fitness function. =
 If you want me to look over your code, email me the
relevant bits.

The wh=
ile(true) in runAgent() allows the agent, once registered and
downloaded th=
e fitness function, to run the same experiment many times 
with different c=
hromosomes from the same generation as distributed by
the experiment server=
.  If it wasn't there, it would perform an
experiment for one individual th=
en shut down.  This does not then take
advantage of the distributed learnin=
g workload.

Any further questions, just ask.

Cheers

Matt
